This is preheader text. Some clients will show this text as a
preview.

*************************************
Simple responsive HTML email template
*************************************

Hi there,

Sometimes you just want to send a simple HTML email with a
basic design.

This is a really simple email template. It's sole purpose
is to get you to click the button below.

All the information you need is on GitHub.

View the source on GitHub ( https://github.com/leemunroe/html-email-template )

Feel free to use, copy, modify this email template as you
wish.

Thanks, have a lovely day.

Follow @leemunroe on Twitter ( http://twitter.com/leemunroe )

Don't like these annoying emails? Unsubscribe ( # ).
